tag_list: investor, vodafone, 4home, octane-software, epiphany, postx, startups, incubator
overview: William is always looking for new early stage companies that focus on innovation and also focus on the greater good. He has worked for a series of successful start ups that have been M&A;’d. He is from the east coast (NY & New England) but now live in the heart of Silicon Valley with my beautiful wife and 2 wee folk.
